instructions: From any Home screen, tap the Apps icon . Tap Settings . Scroll to 'Device,' then tap Applications . Tap Application manager. Swipe left or right to the appropriate screen: RUNNING All Tap the desired application. Tap Turn off to hide.

From any Home screen, tap the Apps icon . Tap Settings . Scroll to 'Device,' then tap Applications . Tap Application manager. Swipe left or right to the appropriate screen: RUNNING All Tap the desired application. Tap Turn on to show.
